K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-1: shr'i sv'a khy'a to n'a m'a dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-6: na mo ratna tra y'a ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-7: na mo bha ga ba te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-8: dharma dh'a tu ni gar dzi ta r'a dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-12: ku m'a ra bh'u t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-15: tri ratna bam sha sam dh'a ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-18: aa b'a yam datte me bo dhi tsitta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-19: badzra pa ri pa l'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-23: sarba satva sam ta na pa ti tam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-24: kle sh'a nu tstshe d'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-26: aa lam kri ta sha r'i re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-27: bo dhi sa tva shi sh'u ba ti p'a l'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-38: aa pa yam dad ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-39: gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-40: 'chi khar yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-41: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thor tshugs kyis dbu brgyan pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470a-42: mngor na gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni mtha' yas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470b-0: 'phags pa @470b 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470b-1: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzny'a na garbha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470b-2: lotstsha ba bande klu'i dbang pos bsgyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470b-3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha si ham dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-026:470b-4: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bande de ba tsandras gtan la phab pa ////
